name: Tails from the Galaxy: Robin
description:
TCS 191 project. A short Ren'Py game depicting Captain Robin Steele talking with a member of their crew. No choices.

Title refers to a larger project named "Tails from the Galaxy," which would admittedly make more sense if I figured out how to add cat ears and a tail to Robin. 

Assets:

Character sprites: http://tokudaya.net/sozai-onna1.html
Slime: https://www.pngkey.com/detail/u2q8q8q8q8a9o0w7_monster-ooze-slime-slime-monster-png/
Background: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/OZoGb
Itch.io background: https://image.shutterstock.com/image-vector/pixel-art-game-location-cosmic-260nw-773003752.jpg
